/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of dynamism to the scene. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a sense of movement and life to the image. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
